name: Dr. Ramesh Kumar
bio: Dr. Ramesh Kumar is a highly experienced dentist with over 10 years of expertise in cosmetic and general dentistry.

name: Dr. Anjali Sharma
bio: Dr. Anjali Sharma specializes in orthodontics, helping patients achieve perfect smiles with modern techniques.

name: Dr. Rajesh Patel
bio: Dr. Rajesh Patel is a pediatric dentist with 12 years of experience in treating children's dental problems.

name: Dr. Sneha Verma
bio: Dr. Sneha Verma is a specialist in root canal treatments and dental restorations.

name: Dr. Arvind Rao
bio: Dr. Arvind Rao is an expert in treating gum diseases and performing dental implants.

name: Dr. Priya Menon
bio: Dr. Priya Menon specializes in dental prosthetics, including dentures, bridges, and crowns.

name: Dr. Rahul Khanna
bio: Dr. Rahul Khanna is a skilled oral surgeon specializing in wisdom tooth extractions and jaw surgeries.

name: Dr. Neha Gupta
bio: Dr. Neha Gupta is known for her expertise in smile makeovers and teeth whitening procedures.

name: Dr. Vinod Mishra
bio: Dr. Vinod Mishra has extensive experience in general dental care and preventive treatments.

name: Dr. Kavita Iyer
bio: Dr. Kavita Iyer is a pediatric dentist specializing in children's dental health and preventive care.

name: Dr. Harish Nanda
bio: Dr. Harish Nanda specializes in braces and aligners for correcting dental alignment issues.

name: Dr. Swati Joshi
bio: Dr. Swati Joshi is a skilled dental surgeon specializing in extractions and minor oral surgeries.
